title: Trump Prepares to Announce 2024 Presidential Campaign Bid
description: The former president, who is expected to announce a third presidential bid shortly after the midterms, opened a swing of four rallies in Iowa.
dc:creator: Michael C. Bender and Maggie Haberman
media:description: Former President Donald J. Trump greeting Senator Chuck Grassley of Iowa at a rally in Sioux City, Iowa, on Thursday.
